body_html:
@wenxizhu I'm seeing a lot of changes from type* variable to type *variable (which aren't right) in your new commits.

I think your original format was very close already. It's just that the new merged comment line was longer than 80 characters again. Could you please go back to your original formatter?

Also, it would be great if you could eliminate the new orphan comment lines clang-format generates, like

// Something that is too long to fit in one line and clang-format wraps around
// like this.
// Something in the next line.

to

// Something that is too long to fit in one line and clang-format wraps around
// like this. Something in the next line.

while also making sure that the new merged line is not too long.
